commit.message: ARQ-299 Proxy server side exceptions and re-create them on the client if possible  (added JBoss header and class level comment)

This + * exception type is is thrown instead and contains information about the + * proxied class and a hint about why it could not be thrown. + * + * @author Andy Gibson + * + */ public class ArquillianProxyException extends RuntimeException { private static final long serialVersionUID = -4703822636139101499L;
